Translations.Text: A wid iumnen! Mmektit ed l$it ikwen I$at Oebbi. Mi d usan $uowen iasekoiwen, Nuzen asen d avu, akked iasekoiwen ur twalam. Oebbi Izga Ipwali ayen txeddmem
Mi wen d kkan sennig wen, seddawat wen, mi zzint wallen, ulawen bbwven s ijuxax, tepmeyyizem yal ameyyez $ef Oebbi
Dinna, ppwajeooben lmumnin, enhezzen s leqsee
Mi d nnan ixabiten, akked imehzulen n wul: "ay $ d Iwaaaed Oebbi, akked Umazan iS, siwa a$uoou
Mi d inna urbaa segsen: "a yAt Yatrib, ur illi umekkan i kunwi, u$alet"! Kra segsen ssutren tsrie i Nnbi, nnan: "ih, ixxamen nne$ aaran". Nitni, ur llin aaran, b$an kan ad rewlen
Ma kecmen ten id, si leriaf is, sinna, ssutren asen ad xubten, ad xubten. Cwii kan ara kukrun fellas
Ni$ llan auhden s Oebbi, uqbel, ar ur ppu$alen ar deffir. Aaahed s Oebbi ad ippuqeiii
Ini: "ur kwen tenfaa trewla, ma trewlem si tmeppant, ne$ si ioad. Ara tezhum, siwa tallit wezzilen
Ini: "anwa wa, ara kwen ikksen seg ufus n Oebbi, ma Ib$a yawen cceoo, ne$ Ib$a yawen aeunu"? Ur asen ppafen, war Oebbi, bab, ne$ asettao
Ni$ Oebbi Ieoa wid degwen, i ipaawwiqen, wid iqqaoen i watmaten nnsen: "Yyat $uone$"! Drus kan degsen, i ikecmen ioad

D imceeeiyen ar loiha nnwen. Ma tusa d tugdi, a ten twaliv la k pmuqulen, tezzint wallen nnsen, am win tessexciwit tmeppant. Ma tekkes tugdi, a kwen gezren s yilsawen uqviaen. D imceeeiyen $ef lxio. Wigi, ur uminen ara. Ihi, Imea Oebbi igiten nnsen. Ayagi, d ayen isehlen i Oebbi
Â£ilen ikabaren ur oueen ara. Lemmer a d asen ikabaren, ad ssirmen, ar nitni, di uueeoa ay llan, ar Waaoaben n uclue, steqsayen fellawen. Lemmer llan yidwen, cwii kan ara nna$en
